tool.name: OGS: IntegrateBoreholesIntoMesh
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'IntegrateBoreholesIntoMesh'.
tool.command: IntegrateBoreholesIntoMesh #if str($max_elevation): --max-elevation '$max_elevation' #end if #if str($min_elevation): --min-elevation '$min_elevation' #end if #if str($max_id): --max-id '$max_id' #end if #if str($min_id): --min-id '$min_id' #end if --geo '$geo' --output '$output' --input '$input'

param.name: max_elevation
param.label: max elevation
param.help: Maximum elevation for an integrated borehole

param.name: min_elevation
param.label: min elevation
param.help: Minimum elevation for an integrated borehole

param.name: max_id
param.label: max id
param.help: Maximum MaterialID for an integrated borehole

param.name: min_id
param.label: min id
param.help: Minimum MaterialID for an integrated borehole

tool.help: This tool runs the **IntegrateBoreholesIntoMesh** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
